titles.title: A resolution to improve the operation of the Senate.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XXXIII of the Standing Rules of the Senate to require, ten days prior to a scheduled recess or adjournment, a two-thirds majority of Members to be on the Senate floor in order for a rollcall vote to be conducted.
